name: Rotation Puppeteer
description:
Kenney Jam 2021, Game where you have to rotate people and the environment to save them.

This is a game where you can control peoples rotation. But whilst you control them they move forward uncontrollably. Your goal is to save them / help them. 

IF YOUR OUTLINE IS WEIRD. I SADLY DONT KNOW WHY. SORRY.

A / D To rotate (or slider if its a ai)

There are a *few* bugs and the outline doesn't work when the project is built. but it was a good learning experience so I uploaded anyways.

Background Music (Royalty Free): 

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/sci-fi
